title: This security hole can crash billions of Chromium browsers, and Google hasn't patched it yet

title: Mitigating prompt injection attacks with a layered defense strategy
summary_en: Who: Posted by Google GenAI Security Team With the rapid adoption of generative AI, a new wave of threats is emerging across the industry with the aim of manipulating the AI systems themselves.. What: Below we describe our prompt injection mitigation product strategy based on extensive research, development, and deployment of improved security mitigations.. When: 2025-06-13T16:03:00.007000+00:00. How: Unlike direct prompt injections, where an attacker directly inputs malicious commands into a prompt, indirect prompt injections involve hidden malicious instructions within external data sources. title: Sustaining Digital Certificate Security - Upcoming Changes to the Chrome Root Store
summary_en: Who: Posted by Chrome Root Program, Chrome Security Team Note: Google Chrome communicated its removal of default trust of Chunghwa Telecom and Netlock in the public forum on May 30, 2025.. What: This approach attempts to minimize disruption to existing subscribers using a previously announced Chrome feature to remove default trust based on the SCTs in certificates.. When: 2025-05-30T14:59:00.005000+00:00.
